content: *felt yourself a whole flock of colorful chirpers perfect for holiday ornaments lion brand yarn * lion brand pattern # 60227ad skill level easy level 2 lion® wool article #820 5 colors 1 ball each crochet hook - size i-9 split ring stitch markers fiberfill stuffing small black glass beads for eyes scraps of felt for beak sewing needle and thread 12 in \ 30 5 cm brown chenille stems for legs birds are worked in rounds beginning at the top of the head wings and tails are worked separately felt pieces before assembly some construction required to finish see also 60165ad felted bird cottage 1 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/felted-bird-cottage
